content.text:
The process of spanning trees in <image 1> is a key concept of graph theory. Which diagram illustrates the construction of a breadth-first spanning tree?

A. a
B. b

The process in diagram (a shows a breadth-first search ( (BFS) where the algorithm explores all the vertices of a graph in breadth-first order, which is characteristic of constructing a breadth-first spanning tree. Diagram (b, on the other hand, shows a depth-first search ( (DFS) which explores as far as possible along each branch before backtracking. Therefore, the correct answer is A.
Now, output the final answer and nothing else:
